I enjoyed this conversation with my best-selling brother Daniel Kooman about how creativity thrives when we venture into new territory.

We have a conversation…
data.text:
If you're not reading books and making it a regular habit, we'll discuss the lifelong benefits you'll miss out on in this episode. Stay tuned to discover a mistake to stay away from, plus book recommendations you should check out! WHAT TO LISTEN FOR • The main benefit of reading more books • A mistake to avoid when reading a book • Must-read book recommendation for growth and moral development Subscribe so you don't miss out on great content and if you love the show, leave an honest rating and review. Link is in the comments! #podcast #podcastingtips #readingbooks

What are your favorite self-improvement books? I've never been big into reading books. I always felt like I was too busy with work, the kids, etc to squeeze it in so I just didn't do it. A few years ago, I started using Audible and it has been a game-changer! My commutes used to be dedicated to mind-numbing morning radio shows and music, but now I look forward to that time for self-improvement. Even if it only helps me improve by 1% a week, that compounds into a huge difference in just a matter of weeks / months / years. If you are in the same boat as me, I highly recommend giving it a shot! If you’re looking for suggestions, here are some of my favorite reads so far: Can't Hurt Me / Never Finished - David Goggins Extreme Ownership / Dichotomy of Leadership / Leadership Strategy – Jocko Willink Do Over / All Takes is a Goal (podcast) – Jon Acuff How to Win Friends and Influence People – Dale Carnegie $100M Leads – Alex Hormozi I’d love to hear some of your favorites in the comments so I can add them to my queue!

Are you ready to take part in an extraordinary adventure? Join me in the journey of resilience and growth in my new book, "The Monsters of Marymount Mansion." Perfect for young readers, this enchanting story is a reminder that sometimes, the most unexpected adventures start with a single brave step. Get your copy and let's explore the shadows and hallways of Marymount Mansion! #MarymountMansion #RellaBBooks #ReadingWithRellaB #ChildrensBooks #Youtube #Podcast

Sara Celi speaks to us about the lessons she has learned in life and how using these lessons have helped her become a top author in her field. You may or may not have interests in writing a book of your own but Sara's insights can be translated to many aspects of life and how to get the most out of it. Take a listen and check out the entire episode with the link in the comment section! Also, check out her newest book releasing November 1st, Scrooge Meets His Match! #Podcast #education #author #learning
